Univoice helps you learn a new language through music & song – no singing skills required! Graded entirely on your pronunciation, our app makes language learning fresh and fun.

Learn to speak Spanish, French, German and English like a native speaker. Unlike traditional language learning apps, that teach you ‘classroom’ speak, Univoice teaches you to speak a new language as it’s spoken in the real world, including idioms and slang words.

Just load up the app, select the language and genre of music that suits your mood and start singing along with the artist. As you sing or speak, you can see the translation of the lyrics back into your native language.

We’ll grade you on your pronunciation, not your pitch or tone, so you can see how well you’ve done and how you improve over time!

Long gone are the days of memorizing long vocabulary lists, repeating the same keywords and phrases, or reading pages of grammar rules. Now you can learn through song – scientifically proven to be one of the most effective ways to learn how to speak a new language!

----------------------------------------------------------
**No singing skill required! We grade only on pronunciation**
• Pick from Spanish, French, German, and English

• Familiarize yourself with idioms & slang words you won’t find in a textbook
• Expand your vocabulary & learn new phrases the fun way... through music!

• Becoming a global citizen & raising globally-minded children
